game.name: DarkPlaces - Aftershock
game.desc: Aftershock for Quake is a commercial add-on for Quake with 4 new episodes developed by HeadGames Publishing, Inc.

game.name: DarkPlaces - Dimension of the Past
game.desc: Dimension of the Past (called "DOPA" for short) is an add-on episode for Quake developed by MachineGames, to commemorate the game's 20th anniversary.

game.name: DarkPlaces - Dissolution of Eternity
game.desc: Two new episodes. Sixteen new levels. One way out.
game.publisher: Activision, id Software, Valve, Virgin, Pulse

game.name: DarkPlaces - Insomnia
game.desc: Large, intricate levels with great gameplay and connectivity, offset with interesting details and clever design. The start map is followed by 2 a2base and a q3gothic map.

game.name: DarkPlaces - Quake
game.desc: Quake is a first-person shooter video game developed by id Software and published by GT Interactive in 1996.

game.name: DarkPlaces - Q!Zone
game.desc: The Quake death squads are back for more bloody battle. This time they won't stop until total victory or total annihilation. Earth's counter offense calls on its best man (you) to wipe out the leader of the Quake dominion.

game.name: DarkPlaces - Scourge of Armagon
game.desc: Quake Mission Pack 1: Scourge of Armagon is the first official mission pack for Quake
